title: How to make notes for the JEE during a lecture - Quora

response.answer_text: Have u joined the coaching? If yes then just use the notes either provided or which u r writing in class. It is much beneficial for you. If not, then either join Unacademy or any other website or by YouTube and start to note down that point which was taught. And most importantly If u r studying chemistry, inorganic highlight the most important point.. (Dnt highlight the whole book) U can choose book of ur choice and if u have confusion then u can ask me either message me or comment down… btw ncert for inorganic is must…. And I will focus on point that dnt waste ur time in making notes in free time like rough fare type concept… Once you have prepared it's okay…just utilize ur time in solving problems…. If u have more doubt about notes then u can message me or comment down.
